title: Brandon Campbell - 5x13 - You Are Being Watched
author: POISuit
comment: Someone once asked me if I learned anything from it all. I learned that Nolan is God! That he can not only write a spellbinding story, but also tell it in a spectacular fashion.
The melancholy in the soundtrack hits right into the feels...i miss it
Love it, thanks for uploading! That combined version of Shaw and Finch's theme is so great. Perfect way to end the show.
Finally a good version out,  been waiting 3 years for this version.
description:
From Person Of Interest 5x13 'return 0'
Composed by: Ramin Djawadi & Brandon Campbell
Source: https://soundcloud.com/d3hmusic/you-a...
